title: Emerald & Diamond Statement Kangan - Classic Vanki Style
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds (estimated 4.12 carats total). Hyderabadi Polish.
features: A striking Vanki-style Kangan featuring two prominent pear-shaped emeralds as the focal points, surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The gold band exhibits intricate detailing that provides flexibility on the wrist. Classic flower petal setting. The modern design gives this bracelet a traditional, timeless charm.
occasions: and other special occasions. Also suitable as a statement piece for modern
description: This handcrafted Vanki/Kangan seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern sophistication. The vibrant emeralds symbolize prosperity and new beginnings, making it a meaningful heirloom piece. The diamonds add brilliance and enhance the overall aesthetic. The Hyderabadi polish gives it a lustrous and durable finish, ensuring lasting beauty.
